DOC.brief_summary: ARATA prospective , non-interventional , multi-center , observational study Germany evaluate long-term effectiveness tolerability subcutaneously administer RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) patient rheumatoid arthritis daily clinical practice . Participants follow observation period 2 year initial injection .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Evaluate Long-Term Effectiveness Tolerability RoActemra®/Actemra® Administered Subcutaneously Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Everyday Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Aged > /= 18 year Informed consent Treatment naive RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) Participation interventional clinical trial rheumatoid arthritis time enrollment
